## TL;DR
- Create project: `pixi exec copier copy gh:roaldarbol/r-template my-new-project && cd my-new-project`
- Open IDE: `pixi run rstudio`
- Add dependencies: `rpix::add("tidyverse")`
- Start analysing your data!
